org.biopax.validator.api

Class ValidatorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biopax.validator.api.ValidatorUtils

  • @Service
public class ValidatorUtils
extends Object
    Validator Utility Class (not BioPAX specific). This is injected into other beans, keeps several global settings and objects, e.g., marshaller, and also provides static service methods to register, merge, do OXM, and resolve validation errors to human-readable verbose messages.
    Author:
    rodche

        public Behavior getRuleBehavior(String ruleName,
